name: The Fish Master - Go Trap Fish
name_original: The Fish Master - Go Trap Fish
description:
Simple and intuitive gameplay for everyone, The Fish Master has cutting edge technique to trap the smaller fishes. Master your fishing skills and collect as many fishes as possible. Avoid being damaged and wrecked into other bigger fishes, seahorse and lot more.

How to play:

• Press and hold to elongate the hook
• Release

Are you ready to become a skilful fish master?
